biography.bio: Mariano Rigillo was born on September 12, 1939 in Naples, Italy. He is known for his work on Il Postino: The Postman (1994), To Rome with Love (2012) and Metello (1970).
biography.name: Mariano Rigillo

biography.bio: Scilla Gabel was born on January 4, 1938 in Rimini, Emilia-Romagna, Italy as Gianfranca Gabellini. She is known for her work on Le Moulin des supplices (1960), Modesty Blaise (1966) and Sodom and Gomorrah (1962). She has been married to Piero Schivazappa since April 14, 1968. They have one child.
biography.name: Scilla Gabel

biography.bio: Pier Paolo Capponi was born on June 9, 1938 in Subiaco, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for The Cat o' Nine Tails (1971), Farinelli (1994) and Forbidden Photos of a Lady Above Suspicion (1970).
biography.name: Pier Paolo Capponi

biography.bio: Teresa Ricci is an actress, known for A Tale of Love (1986), La via degli angeli (1999) and La neve nel bicchiere (1984).
biography.name: Teresa Ricci

biography.bio: Roldano Lupi was born on February 8, 1909 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. He was an actor, known for Flesh Will Surrender (1947), Le témoin (1946) and Devotion (1950). He died on August 13, 1989 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Roldano Lupi

biography.bio: Evar Maran was born on March 8, 1924 in Selvazzano Dentro, Veneto, Italy as Evaristo Maran. He was an actor, known for Accadde tra le sbarre (1955), Carne de horca (1953) and Black Tigress (1967). He died on August 5, 1991 in Padua, Veneto.
biography.name: Evar Maran

biography.bio: Silvano Tranquilli was born on August 23, 1925 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on The Pumaman (1980), Les fleurs du soleil (1970) and Black Belly of the Tarantula (1971). He died on May 10, 1997 in Rome.
biography.name: Silvano Tranquilli

biography.bio: Anna Leonardi is known for her work on Dov'è Anna? (1976), Sangue + fango = Logos passione (1975) and Il matto (1980).
biography.name: Anna Leonardi

biography.bio: Marcello Di Martire is an actor, known for Un bourgeois tout petit, petit (1977), Saint-Michel avait un coq (1972) and Barabbas (1961).
biography.name: Marcello Di Martire

biography.bio: Renato Montalbano was born on May 17, 1931 in Catania, Sicily, Italy. He is an actor, known for The Hawks and the Sparrows (1966), Mamma Roma (1962) and Jésus de Nazareth (1977).
biography.name: Renato Montalbano

biography.bio: Serena Michelotti was born on October 2, 1934 in Merano, Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy. She was an actress, known for Chiedimi se sono felice (2000), It Can Be Done Amigo (1972) and The Appointment (1969). She died on July 19, 2011 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Serena Michelotti
